name: Noska Ur'gray

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: Noska has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of Noska's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: Noska has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

trait.name: Difficult Climber
text: Noska has disadvantage on Strength checks made to climb, due to his disability.

action.name: Mace
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

description:
Noska is a ruthless enforcer in the Xanathar Guild. A green slime in Undermountain dissolved his left hand and forearm, and the lost appendage has been replaced with a heavy crossbow that attaches to the stump.
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 213
